full_threads.body:
Hi David,

We have made some changes on the staging site. Please have a look and let me know if you are good to push this to live?
https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/wp-login.php
You can use you same logins.
@heath Can I assume that this is a go ahead?

Thanks Joel, I checked the attached documents on the warehouse tablets and the screenshot appears in the same format as the sample word doc. Looks like you've found the solution

David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

http://advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David, 

Hope you are well and thanks for getting back to us. 

We have been working on the WordDoc, and I just want to check this with you (incrementally) to make sure it's loading correctly on the team's computers/devices. 

Please see attached, there is a sample WordDoc and a screenshot of what it should look like for your reference. Can you please have a look and confirm they match at your end? If all good, it will be a 4hr task for us to code, so I will need your go-ahead please.

Hi Joel,

I had the boys test the attachment and they can edit it.

If we could use this version of the word doc generator going forward, that would be great.

David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

http://advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David,

Confirming the "Truck Notes" are now on the live site.

Regarding the word document. We are working on a new version of the word doc generator.
Please see the attached and let me know if this opens on a correct format?

Hi Joel, that works perfectly. There's enough space for a signature (part of our sign off procedures) after the end of the schedule and then it has the Team Leader install notes.

Good to go live.

Could I also ask if there's an update on Rob (from Lanters) request to change the version of the word doc.

(I've copied below his request in red)

I assume what may be occurring is that your system may be creating .docx files, that are based on the XML document format, which means the team has to 'convert' to the standard .docx for Word.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/compat/office-file-format-reference

To answer your question, we are using the following version (or around there)



At the moment our team manually convert the files each day. Ideally I'd like to stop that by having the word doc generated already in the right format

David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

http://advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David,

We have made some changes on the word. Please see the attached.
Let me know if this works for you? and I will push this one to live.

Hi Heath, Just wanted to follow up on how you were going adding this to the end of the word schedule when a quote is signed off.

At the moment, we are adding it in manually.

If it helps, we want it to look like the attached (disregard the signature). The boys then edit this document on line by typing in free text under the headings in red. Please don't add lines for them to write on

thanks



David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

http://advantagestyling.com.au/

attachments.filename: install summary notes at end of schedule.pdf

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,
I know Rob from Lanter has asked you to change the file format of the word doc the quote platform saves the schedule in. This is to help us with some changes we are making to move towards a paperless delivery service, where our team use ipads for all jobs.
As part of that, I'd like to make a small change to the word document that is generated when the quote is accepted.
Can we add the below "Install Notes" to directly under the end of the schedule. This will be edited by our truck teams when they are at a job, so the pick up team know important details like best place to park etc.


I know you are doing some work with Dan already on amending some margins in the word file which changed when we moved to the Novari branding. Let me know if you want to do it all as one job, or if this is a quick fix
Thanks




David McLean

GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 |davidm@advantagestyling.com.au

029310 1611|Tenancy1, Unit1, 14ABaker Street BanksmeadowNSW 2019

advantagestyling.com.au
